metadata.name: 'enhanced boss bars
metadata.description:
A mod that reimagines boss health bars to be more unique, customizeable and responsive.
[h2]Features[/h2] [list] [*] Unique icons for every boss [*] Over 30 special bar designs [*] One bar for each individual boss and boss segement [*] Fully customizable [*] Full modding support [/list]
[h2]Configuration[/h2] You can use '[url=]Mod config Menu[/url]' to customize this mod! Alternatively you can edit the config.lua file found in the mod files.
[h2]Special Thanks[/h2] [list] [*] [b]Sillst[/b] for the awesome mod thumbnail [*] [b]minichibis[/b] for letting us use their "[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1674940041]Agnry Faic Boss Bar[/url]" icons [*] [b]Spyro[/b] for letting us use their "[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=839983526]Better Boss Bar[/url]" design [*] [b]Hatterene[/b] for letting us use their "[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=834198360]Better boss Bar[/url]" design [*] [b]serious max[/b] for letting us use their "[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1431781210]Boss Health bar background[/url]" design [*] [b]TheSavageHybrid[/b] for letting us use their "[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2515917831]Paper Healthbars[/url]" design [*] [b]hippocrunchy[/b] for letting us use their "[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2530772508]Alt Horsemen (+War)[/url]" mod as an example [/list]
